MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The erina has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Hardy
MonsterTrait.Text: The erina has advantage on saving throws against poison.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spines
MonsterTrait.Text: An enemy who hits the erina with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The erina defender makes two attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Shortsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2)

MonsterAction.Name: Shortbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Protect
MonsterTrait.Text: The erina imposes disadvantage on an attack roll made against an ally within 5 feet of the erina defender.
